definition.name: Setup ccache action
definition.description: Setup ccache easily in your workflow, with all the tuning knobs you need!
definition.author: Chocobo1 <https://github.com/Chocobo1>

inputs.name: update_packager_index
inputs.description: By default, this action will update packager's indexes to avoid installation issues (`apt`/`brew` on linux/macOS respectively). You can disable it to save some time however you are then responsible for ensuring the packager's indexes are up-to-date *before* using this action

inputs.name: install_ccache
inputs.description: By default, this action will install ccache with package manager. You can omit installation if you've already installed ccache and it is accessible in the shell

inputs.name: prepend_symlinks_to_path
inputs.description: By default, this action will prepend ccache's compiler symlinks directory to PATH so that compiler invocations will be handled by ccache transparently. https://ccache.dev/manual/latest.html#_run_modes

inputs.name: windows_compile_environment
inputs.description: Specify which compiler environment you are going to use on Windows image. Note that this field (a single value) is mandatory if you use this action on a Windows image. Available options are: ['msvc', 'msys2']

inputs.name: restore_cache
inputs.description: Whether to restore the cache at the start of this action

inputs.name: store_cache
inputs.description: Whether to store the cache at the end of job execution

inputs.name: remove_stale_cache
inputs.description: Whether to remove previous/stale cache entries after store cache completed. This requires parameter `api_token` to be valid. This requires `actions: write` permission. Note that for GitHub Pull Requests, only `actions: read` permission will be given so this feature won't work reliably there.

inputs.name: override_cache_key
inputs.description: Override cache key which is used for storing/retrieving the cache. Accept a string. Leave it empty to use the default value

inputs.name: override_cache_key_fallback
inputs.description: Override additional cache keys for retrieving the cache. Accept a list of strings. Leave it empty to use the default value

inputs.name: ccache_options
inputs.description: Config settings for ccache. Accept a list of key=value pairs. Ref: https://ccache.dev/manual/latest.html#_configuration_options

outputs.name: cache_hit
outputs.description: This variable will be set to `true` when there is an cache hit, otherwise `false`
